docs.title: Documentation

docs.heroDescription: Comprehensive financial management platform built with Rust + Next.js for individuals and teams
docs.featuresDescription: Everything you need for modern financial management
docs.securityDescription: Role-based access control for team collaboration

docs.builtWithLove: Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è by the Philand Team
docs.userGuideDescription: Step-by-step guide to get the most out of Philand
docs.gettingStartedDescription: Learn the basics of budget management with Philand
docs.step1Description: Sign up with your email and create a secure password. Verify your account to get started.
docs.step2Description: Create a budget for personal use or invite team members for collaborative financial management.
docs.step3Description: Organize your finances by creating income and expense categories that match your lifestyle.
docs.step4Description: Add your income and expenses daily. Use the quick-add feature for faster entry.
docs.step5Description: Review monthly summaries, charts, and reports to understand your financial patterns.
docs.budgetManagementDescription: Master the art of collaborative budgeting
docs.teamCollaborationDescription: Work together on shared financial goals
docs.advancedFeaturesDescription: Unlock powerful tools for financial analysis
docs.bestPracticesDescription: Tips and tricks from financial experts
